trans-unit.source: Provides properties and methods for evaluating and editing an application setting expression in a configuration file at design time.
trans-unit.target: 提供評估和編輯組態檔中的應用程式設定運算式，在設計階段屬性和方法。

trans-unit.source: The AppSettingsExpressionEditor class is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor> class and provides an implementation for evaluating and associating an application setting reference with a control property at design time.
trans-unit.target: AppSettingsExpressionEditor 類別衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor>類別，並提供用於評估和關聯的控制項屬性中的應用程式設定參考，在設計階段實作。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can bind the value of a control property to the application setting expression `AppSettings:mySettingKeyName`, which indicates that the control property value is set using the `mySettingKeyName` value in the `appSettings` section of the Web configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 例如，將控制項屬性的值繫結至應用程式設定運算式`AppSettings:mySettingKeyName`，表示控制項屬性值已設定使用`mySettingKeyName`值`appSettings`Web 組態檔區段。

trans-unit.source: A visual designer host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], uses the AppSettingsExpressionEditor class to select an application setting from the `appSettings` configuration section, and then evaluates the selected expression for design-time rendering.
trans-unit.target: 視覺化設計工具裝載，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]，選取從應用程式設定使用 AppSettingsExpressionEditor 類別`appSettings`組態區段，然後判斷設計階段呈現選取的運算式。

trans-unit.source: When you browse to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.Expressions%2A> property for a control in the design-time properties grid, the visual designer displays a dialog box to set expressions that provide the run-time value for a control property.
trans-unit.target: 當您瀏覽至<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.Expressions%2A>屬性在設計階段屬性方格控制項的視覺化設計工具會顯示一個對話方塊來提供執行階段值的控制項屬性的集合運算式。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.Expressions%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can select the expression type based on a list of expression prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選取清單運算式前置字元為基礎的運算式型別。

trans-unit.source: When you select the **AppSettings** expression prefix from the list, the visual designer host uses the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet> object to provide design-time editing functionality of `appSettings` expressions and uses AppSettingsExpressionEditor methods to evaluate and convert the expression string based on the syntax for an application setting expression.
trans-unit.target: 當您選取**AppSettings**運算式前置字元，從清單中，視覺化設計工具主應用程式會使用相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet>物件來提供設計階段編輯功能`appSettings`評估，並將轉換的運算式字串的運算式，並使用 AppSettingsExpressionEditor 方法為基礎的應用程式設定運算式的語法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet>

trans-unit.source: The visual designer host uses the evaluated expression result to assign control property values that are rendered on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 視覺化設計工具主應用程式可用於評估的運算式結果指派控制項的設計介面上所呈現的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor.ExpressionPrefix%2A> property for an AppSettingsExpressionEditor object returns the string `AppSettings`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor.ExpressionPrefix%2A>AppSettingsExpressionEditor 物件的屬性會傳回字串`AppSettings`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor.ExpressionPrefix%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder> class is associated with the expression prefix `AppSettings` and the AppSettingsExpressionEditor implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder>類別是運算式前置詞相關聯`AppSettings`和 AppSettingsExpressionEditor 實作。</xref:System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.AppSettingsExpressionEditor.EvaluateExpression%2A> method evaluates an input application setting expression string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.AppSettingsExpressionEditor.EvaluateExpression%2A>方法評估輸入應用程式設定運算式字串。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.AppSettingsExpressionEditor.EvaluateExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor.GetExpressionEditorSheet%2A> method returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet> implementation that is used to enter and edit application setting expressions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor.GetExpressionEditorSheet%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet>用來輸入及編輯應用程式設定運算式的實作。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor.GetExpressionEditorSheet%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.AppSettingsExpressionEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.AppSettingsExpressionEditor"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.AppSettingsExpressionEditor> class is configured by the base class together with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor.ExpressionPrefix%2A> property set to `AppSettings`.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.AppSettingsExpressionEditor>類別基底類別，連同設定<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor.ExpressionPrefix%2A>屬性設定為`AppSettings`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor.ExpressionPrefix%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.AppSettingsExpressionEditor>

trans-unit.source: Evaluates an application setting expression string and provides the design-time value for a control property.
trans-unit.target: 評估應用程式設定運算式字串並提供設計階段值的控制項屬性。

trans-unit.source: The EvaluateExpression method looks up the application setting that is specified by `expression`, and then returns the value of the application setting.
trans-unit.target: EvaluateExpression 方法查閱所指定的應用程式設定`expression`，然後傳回應用程式設定的值。

trans-unit.source: The visual designer uses the EvaluateExpression method to evaluate an application setting expression and provide the design-time value for an associated control property.
trans-unit.target: 視覺化設計工具會使用 EvaluateExpression 方法來評估應用程式設定運算式，並提供設計階段相關聯的控制項屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The visual designer calls the EvaluateExpression method with the expression string, and uses the evaluated expression result to assign control property values that are rendered on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 視覺化設計工具會呼叫 EvaluateExpression 方法運算式的字串，並指派控制項的設計介面上所呈現的屬性值時，用於評估的運算式結果。

trans-unit.source: At run time, the page parser uses the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder.EvaluateExpression%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder.GetCodeExpression%2A> methods of the corresponding <xref:System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder> implementation to evaluate an expression and provide the run-time value for an associated control property.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段，頁面剖析器會使用<xref:System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder.EvaluateExpression%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder.GetCodeExpression%2A>方法對應<xref:System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder>實作，以評估運算式，並提供執行階段相關聯的控制項屬性值。</xref:System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder> </xref:System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder.GetCodeExpression%2A> </xref:System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder.EvaluateExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: An application setting expression string to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: 要評估的應用程式設定運算式字串。

trans-unit.source: `expression` does not include the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AppSettings" name="AppSettings" href=""></xref> expression prefix.
trans-unit.target: `expression`不包含<xref uid="langword_csharp_AppSettings" name="AppSettings" href=""></xref>運算式前置字元。

trans-unit.source: An object containing additional parsing information for evaluating `expression`.
trans-unit.target: 物件，其中包含其他剖析的資訊來評估`expression`。

trans-unit.source: The control property type.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的屬性型別。

trans-unit.source: A service provider implementation supplied by the designer host, used to obtain additional design-time services.
trans-unit.target: 用來取得額外的設計階段服務設計工具主應用程式所提供的服務提供者實作。

trans-unit.source: The object referenced by expression, if the expression evaluation succeeded; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 所參考的物件 expression ，如果運算式評估成功，否則 。

trans-unit.source: Returns an expression editor sheet for an application setting expression.
trans-unit.target: 傳回應用程式設定運算式的運算式編輯器工作表。

trans-unit.source: The GetExpressionEditorSheet method returns a simple editor sheet implementation, which uses a single input string to form the expression.
trans-unit.target: GetExpressionEditorSheet 方法會傳回簡單的編輯器工作表的實作，其使用單一的輸入的字串的運算式。

trans-unit.source: The expression string set for a control property, used to initialize the expression editor sheet.
trans-unit.target: 設定用來初始化運算式編輯器工作表的控制項屬性的運算式字串。

trans-unit.source: `expression` does not include the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AppSettings" name="AppSettings" href=""></xref> expression prefix.
trans-unit.target: `expression`不包含<xref uid="langword_csharp_AppSettings" name="AppSettings" href=""></xref>運算式前置字元。

trans-unit.source: A service provider implementation supplied by the designer host, used to obtain additional design-time services.
trans-unit.target: 用來取得額外的設計階段服務設計工具主應用程式所提供的服務提供者實作。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet"></xref> implementation that defines the application setting expression properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet"> </xref>定義應用程式設定運算式屬性的實作。
